meta.name: description
meta.content: Westlake Academy Public Charter School serves grades K-12 in Westlake, Texas, in Tarrant County. Westlake Academy is also an IB World School.

li.a: Welcome from the Mayor / School Board President
What does it mean to be a Texas Public Charter School?

header.h2: School Closure extended to the end of the school year; Distance Learning to continue.

div.p: Per orders from Governor Greg Abbott, all Texas schools will remain closed through the end the school year. Read more details from Superintendent Amanda DeGan.

div.p: 2019 Valedictorian, Sahejbir Bhatia and Salutatorian, Macy Orman.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1366px; height: auto
div.p: 2019 Teachers of the Year Misty Argo and Sarah Titus.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1366px; height: auto
div.p: Dr. Bryson meets with a group of Grade 5 students to discuss ideas for the House Logo designs.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1366px; height: auto
div.p: OSS 2019 - This year students in Grades 6-10 went out into the community and volunteered their time at places such as Community Storehouse, Common Ground Garden and GRACE, among others.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1366px; height: auto
div.p: PYP Field Day was a day filled with fun. The big winner this year was Whitman!

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1366px; height: auto
div.p: Grade 2 students visit the Texas Discovery Gardens and learn about the life cycle of butterflies.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1366px; height: auto
div.p: Students in Mrs. Barkman's Grade 6 Language Arts Class acted out the play "Romeo and Juliet" to enhance their learning experience.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1366px; height: auto
div.p: PYP Students visit the Old Red Museum in Dallas.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1366px; height: auto
div.p: PYP students visit the Old Red Museum in Dallas.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1366px; height: auto
div.p: Grade 5 students visit the Perot Museum in Dallas.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1366px; height: auto
div.p: Mayor Laura Wheat visits with Grade 4 students as a part of their unit of inquiry, "How we Organize Ourselves."

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1366px; height: auto
div.p: Grade 4 visits the Old Red Museum in Dallas.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1366px; height: auto
div.p: Our Seniors enjoyed their monthly lunch. This month's decorations were self portraits they drew with their Kindergarten buddies - another way our K-12 campus stands out.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1366px; height: auto
div.p: Dr. Bryson explores connection between leadership and the IB Learner Profile with Grade 4 students.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1366px; height: auto
div.p: Class of 2015, Delaney Wood, making an impact on and off the court.

div.style: color: #fff; background: rgba(0,0,0,.5); display: block; position: absolute; z-index: 99; padding: 1em; box-sizing: border-box;top: auto; bottom: 0; left: 0; width: 1366px; height: auto
div.p: photo courtesy of Debra Hale, Hillwood Dev. Co. LLC

article.aria-label: All Faculty Meeting - Teacher of the Year Celebration

h3.a: All Faculty Meeting - Teacher of the Year Celebration

div.div: Location: Gym, J T Ottinger Rd, Westlake, TX 76262, USA

h1.a: School Closure extended to the end of the school year; Distance Learning to continue.

section.p: Per orders from Governor Greg Abbott, all Texas schools will remain closed through the end the school year. Read more details from Superintendent Amanda DeGan.
US News and World Report top high school rankings just in: #11 in Texas and #100 in the US with a total score of 99.44%.
WA Closure Date Extended through the end of the school year. For all the latest information, please visit our dedicated Coronavirus webpage.

Thank you for all that you are doing to educate your children at home and all of your effort to keep you family safe. Over the next several weeks, we will be sharing information via our social media channels in partnership with the TEA. Sharing best practices will educate us so that we can stop the spread of COVID-19. To see our updates, please follow us on our Westlake Academy Facebook page, and on Twitter at @WABlacksmiths.

In order to help keep our students and staff safe, Westlake Academy will follow the Tarrant County Health Department community mitigation strategies received this morning. As a result, the Westlake Academy campus will close from March 16 to April 3, 2020. This includes all extracurricular activities and school events. Read more...

div.aside: Municipally Owned K-12 Texas Public Charter School
